summary: This document is a deposit account opening application for Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas (DBTCA), detailing various account types and terms. It includes information on customer identification policies and obligations related to anti-money laundering and terrorist financing. The document emphasizes the importance of accurate information and compliance with legal requirements.
keyFacts: The document outlines the requirements for opening a deposit account with DBTCA, including identification and verification of the account holder.
It mentions the legal obligations of financial institutions to combat money laundering and terrorist financing.
The document includes terms regarding joint accounts and the rights of account holders in relation to withdrawals and account management.
There is a requirement for clients to notify DBTCA of any changes to their personal or institutional information.
The document emphasizes the importance of accurate information provided by the account holder and the potential legal implications of inaccuracies.
